data.actual_result: The cooldown popup does not show up
data.expected_result: The cooldown popup shows up in the overlay
data.short_description: Spam cooldown popup does not show up on overlay
data.steps_to_repro: - Attempt to quickly send messages in the normal client and observe the cooldown popup ("Enter the chillzone") - Attempt to do the same in the overlay and notice the popup is missing
